channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Social Media Tells You Who You Are. What if It's Totally Wrong?
item.description: Pinterest and Threads seem convinced I’m in my 60s or going through menopause. Spend enough time in the bizarro worlds of these feeds, and you can sta...

item.title: Fellow Aiden Coffee Maker Review: A Great Cup Made Simple
item.description: This high-end drip machine offers pour-over quality with minimal hassle.

item.title: Sony Linkbuds Open Review: Better Battery, Softer Sound
item.description: Sony’s updated open earbuds add better battery life and a different sound signature for all-day wearability.

item.title: Xbox will soon let players buy games directly in its Android app following Google antitrust ruling
